name: King of Board
description:
King of Board is the best free online combined boards game, feature 4 games: Chess, Chinese chess (a.k.a Xiangqi), Mysterious chess (a.k.a Dark chess), Five in a Row (a.k.a Gomoku, Caro or Tic Tac Toe - 5 in Row).

Featuring:

-- Robust and stable online board game
-- A lot of config to control game setting, provide fair game play to all players
-- Powerful and fun chat system with kaomoji
-- Add friend, chat and challenge your friends
-- 4 board games in an app: Chess, Chinese chess, Mysterious chess (a.k.a Dark chess), Five in a Row
-- Weekly and monthly leaderboards and ranking
-- Daily missions
-- Tournaments
-- Free to play
